title: Tina Cipollari si confessa | il suo matrimonio √® finito per un motivo sconvolgente | Tutta la verit√† sul divorzio
text:
Tina Cipollari si confessa | il suo matrimonio √® finito per un motivo sconvolgente | Tutta la verit√† sul divorzio
L‚Äôopinionista, protagonista a Uomini e Donne, racconta della fine del suo matrimonio svelando qualche retroscena. Tina Cipollari, nome d‚Äôarte di Maria Concetta Cipollari, √® una delle opinioniste pi√π famose e longeve del panorama televisivo italiano. La sua carriera √® indissolubilmente legata al programma di Maria De Filippi, ‚ÄúUomini e Donne‚Äù, dove ha esordito come corteggiatrice e tronista, per poi diventare un‚Äôopinionista amatissima dal pubblico.√à diventata un punto di riferimento per molti telespettatori grazie alla sua schiettezza e alla sua capacit√† di dire sempre quello che pensa, senza peli sulla lingua. Le sue battute pungenti e le sue frecciatine ai protagonisti del programma hanno fatto di lei una delle colonne portanti del format.La vita sentimentale di Tina Cipollari √® stata spesso al centro del gossip.Leggi su Ilfogliettone.it

author: Daily Excelsior
title: Dense fog forces diversion of nearly 60 flights at Delhi airport in three days - DailyExcelsior
text: NEW DELHI, Dec 28 : Flight operations continued to be impacted by dense fog at the Delhi airport for the third day on Thursday, with nearly 60 flights getting diverted and scores getting delayed during this period. Airport sources said a total of 58 flights, the majority of them operated by domestic carriers, were diverted due to bad weather between 0000 hours of December 25 to 0600 hours of December 28. Most of the flights had to be diverted, as the pilots were not trained to operate flights in low visibility conditions, the sources claimed. As many as 13 flights of IndiGo were diverted while 10 flights each of Air India and SpiceJet were diverted during the period. Among others, 5 flights of Vistara, 3 flights of Akasa Air and 2 flights of Alliance Air were diverted at the Delhi airport. The flights were diverted to Jaipur, Lucknow and Indore, among other airports. On Wednesday, Delhi airport issued a fog alert on social media platform X. ‚ÄúWhile landing and takeoffs continue at Delhi Airport, flights that are not CAT III compliant may get affected. ‚ÄúPassengers are requested to contact the airline concerned for updated flight information. Any inconvenience caused is deeply regretted,‚Äù it had said. Similar alerts were issued on Tuesday also. CAT III pertains to flight operations in low visibility conditions. The Delhi airport is the country‚Äôs largest airport and handles more than 1,300 flights daily. In the past few days, the national capital has been witnessing dense fog, especially in the early morning hours. (PTI)

author: VNExplorer
title: Dividend Investors: Top Canadian Utility Stocks for Year-End and Into 2024
text:
HIGH VOLTAGE ELECRICITY TOWERS
Utility stocks are a good consideration for a diversified long-term portfolio. They generally provide decent dividend income and reliable dividend growth. Here are some top Canadian utility stocks that look ripe for picking!
Fortis stock The stock of regulated utility Fortis (TSX:FTS) is experiencing a bit of a dip. It is a blue-chip stock that Canadian investors can trust with their capital that they don‚Äôt need for a long time. This year marks Fortis‚Äôs 50th consecutive year of dividend growth, representing one of the longest dividend-growth streaks on the TSX. It‚Äôs a demonstration of a business that delivers reliable results throughout the economic cycle.
Sure enough, the diversified North American utility, which primarily offers essential services of electricity and gas distribution and transmission, rarely experiences dips in its adjusted earnings per share, even in recessions.
Higher interest rates are one reason for Fortis stock‚Äôs dip. At $53.96 per share, it trades at a price-to-earnings ratio (P/E) of about 17.6, which is a decent valuation compared to its long-term normal valuation. Specifically, it trades at a discount of approximately 10%. At this level, it offers a safe dividend yield of close to 4.4%. Obviously, this isn‚Äôt the highest-yielding utility, but top-quality stocks often don‚Äôt have the highest yields in the industry.
You can sleep well at night with Fortis stock. The business is so predictable that management already projects dividend growth of 4-6% per year for the next few years.
Emera stock Another top Canadian utility stock that appears good for consideration is Emera (TSX:EMA). Like Fortis, it‚Äôs a regulated utility with North American assets. The two stocks typically move in tandem with similar total returns. However, Emera generally offers a bigger dividend yield. Here‚Äôs a comparison of their 10-year total returns for illustration purposes.
FTS Total Return Level Chart
FTS and Emera 10-Year Total Return Level data by YCharts
At the recent price of $49.43 per share, Emera stock trades at a P/E of roughly 16.1, which is a discount of approximately 12% from its long-term normal valuation. At this level, it offers a juicy dividend yield of about 5.8%, which is almost a third more than the income available from Fortis. So, income-hungry investors may be inclined to lean more towards a position in Emera over Fortis.
Notably, Emera does have a higher payout ratio than Fortis. Its payout ratio is about 91% of its adjusted earnings this year versus Fortis‚Äôs payout ratio of about 75%. Therefore, it‚Äôs likely that Emera‚Äôs dividend growth will be slower than Fortis‚Äôs over the next few years.
Brookfield Infrastructure Partners Brookfield Infrastructure Partners (TSX:BIP.UN) is an interesting utility stock. It tends to experience bigger corrections than the above two stocks in a market pullback. But those turn out to be incredible buy-the-dip opportunities, as the stock subsequently makes a strong comeback.
In the last dip, the stock was more sensitive to higher interest rates than the other two utilities because it has a more leveraged balance sheet. However, the company has strong access to capital and maintains an investment-grade S&P credit rating of BBB+. So, the stock recovered swiftly, as shown in the chart below.
BIP.UN Total Return Level Chart
BIP.UN 10-Year Total Return Level data by YCharts
Investors who can withstand volatility could potentially create greater wealth with Brookfield Infrastructure stock in the long run. At $42.03 per unit, the global infrastructure stock offers a cash distribution yield of about 4.8%. Analysts believe the stock trades at a discount of about 15%. Based on its history of outperformance, it‚Äôs probable that it‚Äôll deliver the highest cash distribution growth among the three utility stocks over the next few years.
Should You Invest $1,000 In Brookfield Infrastructure Partners? Before you consider Brookfield Infrastructure Partners, you‚Äôll want to hear this.
Our market-beating analyst team just revealed what they believe are the 10 best starter stocks for investors to buy in 2024‚Ä¶ and Brookfield Infrastructure Partners wasn‚Äôt on the list.
The online investing service they‚Äôve run for nearly a decade, Motley Fool Stock Advisor Canada, is beating the TSX by 32 percentage points. And right now, they think there are 10 stocks that are better buys.
Get Our 10 Starter Stocks Today
* Returns as of 12/22/23
More reading
Fool contributor Kay Ng has positions in Brookfield Infrastructure Partners. The Motley Fool recommends Brookfield Infrastructure Partners, Emera, and Fortis. The Motley Fool has a disclosure policy.

author: ESPN.com.br
title: Corinthians confirma les√£o na coxa de Raniele, que vira desfalque para os pr√≥ximos jogos
text:
O Corinthians divulgou na noite desta quinta-feira (20) que o volante Raniele sofreu uma les√£o de grau dois no b√≠ceps femoral da coxa direita.
A previs√£o de retorno para esse tipo de les√£o √© de pelo menos um m√™s.
De acordo com o clube paulista, o camisa 14 vai iniciar tratamento com a equipe de fisioterapia nesta sexta-feira.
Raniele se machucou aos 18 minutos do 1¬∫ tempo da partida contra a Universidad Central, na Venezuela, na √∫ltima quarta-feira, pela CONMEBOL Libertadores, e deu lugar a Breno Bidon.
Dessa forma, Raniele est√° fora do duelo de volta contra o time venezuelano e tamb√©m deve desfalcar a equipe nas quartas de final do Campeonato Paulista.
Pr√≥ximos jogos do Corinthians:
Universidad Central(C) - 26/02, 21h30 (de Bras√≠lia) -CONMEBOL Libertadores- Transmiss√£o ao vivo doDisney+

author: Salman Khan
title: Packers‚Äô QB Jordan Love Rescues Student Amidst Snowstorm Ahead of Playoff Game
text:
Nick Saban's Retirement Announced, Shocks Miami Dolphins Quarterback Tua Tagovailoa
Packers‚Äô QB Jordan Love Rescues Student Amidst Snowstorm Ahead of Playoff Game
Lucy Kurowski, a student at the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee, found herself in an extraordinary situation when she was caught in a snowstorm in her hometown of De Pere, Wisconsin. As the white flurry intensified, an unexpected helping hand extended towards her. The hand was none other than that of Jordan Love, the quarterback for the Green Bay Packers. This unforeseen encounter took place on January 12, as confirmed by Kurowski‚Äôs aunt, Allie Adames.
A Surprise in the Snowstorm
Caught in the harsh Wisconsin winter, Kurowski found herself battling the elements. But who would have imagined that her knight in shining armor would be a National Football League (NFL) star? The Packers‚Äô quarterback came to her aid, assisting her amidst the snowstorm. This act of kindness, taking place just days before his team‚Äôs crucial playoff game, is a testament to the athlete‚Äôs compassion off the field.
Award-winning Player Lends a Hand
Jordan Love is not just an ordinary football player. He was recently awarded the title of NFC Offensive Player of the Week for his striking performance in week 18 against the Chicago Bears. This recognition underscores Love‚Äôs on-field prowess, and his assistance to Kurowski highlights his character beyond the sports arena.
Looking Ahead to the Playoffs
While Love‚Äôs kind act has warmed the hearts of many, his focus is undoubtedly on the upcoming playoff game. The Green Bay Packers are scheduled to face off against the Dallas Cowboys this coming Sunday, in what promises to be an exciting matchup. The team will travel to Dallas on Saturday, preparing to compete in this highly-anticipated event.

author: VNExplorer
title: El gato que evit√≥ la muerte col√°ndose en un crucero: esta es su historia
text:
El gato, llamado Ovie, fue introducido de manera ilegal en un crucero de Royal Caribbean. Unos agentes de bioseguridad quer√≠an aplicarle la eutanasia, pero la tripulaci√≥n no lo permiti√≥. ¬øQu√© pas√≥ con el felino?
El gato fue encontrado durante una inspecci√≥n de rutina en el crucero.
¬øC√≥mo una persona logra subir con un gato a un barco sin que nadie se d√© cuenta? Esta es la pregunta que intentan resolver las autoridades y la tripulaci√≥n de Ovation of the Seas de Royal Caribbean.
Agentes de bioseguridad de Nueva Zelanda encontraron a Ovie, como fue llamado el gato, en la cabina de un hu√©sped a inicios de diciembre de 2023. La tripulaci√≥n, que estaba at√≥nita ante el hallazgo, tuvo que actuar de manera r√°pida, pues el gatito iba a ser sacrificado.
‚Äú¬°Conoce Ovie! ¬°El gato que un hu√©sped introdujo de contrabando a bordo del Ovation of the Seas! Creemos que estaba en la sudadera del invitado y suponemos que debi√≥ estar sedado o algo as√≠‚Äù, indic√≥ el presidente y director ejecutivo de Royal Caribbean Cruises, Michael Bayley, en Facebook.
Seg√∫n Bayley, un pasajero (cuya identidad no fue revelada) subi√≥ a Ovie de contrabando en el crucero que sali√≥ de Haw√°i, Estados Unidos, con destino a Sydney, Australia. Al gato no se le permiti√≥ salir del barco durante las casi tres semanas que dur√≥ el recorrido.
Royal Caribbean trabaj√≥ con las autoridades locales para ver si el gato pod√≠a ser ingresado legalmente a Nueva Zelanda. Desafortunadamente, esto no fue posible debido a las regulaciones federales, por eso, deb√≠an aplicarle la eutanasia.
Leer: ¬øC√≥mo tranquilizar a un gato durante un viaje largo?
Cabe resaltar que estas inspecciones, en las que encontraron a Ovie, son obligatorias en todos los cruceros que ingresan a pa√≠ses extranjeros. De esta manera, las autoridades se aseguran de que no haya contrabando de plantas, frutas, animales, entre otros.
Un nuevo destino para Ovie La tripulaci√≥n de Royal Caribbean no quer√≠a que Ovie fuera sacrificado, por eso, trabajaron con las autoridades para encontrar una soluci√≥n y salvar la vida del felino. Y la misi√≥n se logr√≥: despu√©s de haber sido puesto en cuarentena y tras ser sometido a una serie de ex√°menes para descartar cualquier enfermedad, Ovie pudo desembarcar en Nueva Zelanda y luego fue trasladado en un avi√≥n a Miami, Estados Unidos, donde una familia lo estaba esperando. Royal Caribbean asumi√≥ los gatos de este proceso, seg√∫n Travel Pulse.
‚ÄúNuestro equipo de atenci√≥n al hu√©sped dio un paso al frente y, despu√©s de varias semanas y de muchos idas y venidas, llev√≥ a Ovie de manera segura al otro lado del mundo para que fuera adoptado por uno de los miembros del equipo de atenci√≥n al hu√©sped en Miami. Ovie ahora vive feliz en Miami‚Äù, agreg√≥ Bayley en Facebook.
Despu√©s de conocer la historia de Ovie, varios usuarios en redes sociales resaltaron la labor de la tripulaci√≥n y, asimismo, hicieron un llamado para fortalecer sus niveles de seguridad. ‚ÄúGran final para la historia. Esperemos que el propietario original sea severamente penalizado por poner al pobre Ovie en esta situaci√≥n‚Äù, ‚ÄúGracias por no castigar a este hermoso gato. ¬°Deseando a Ovie y su nueva familia todo lo mejor!‚Äù, ‚Äú¬øC√≥mo uno ingresa a un gato en el barco? ¬øLas bolsas pasan por rayos X?‚Äù, son algunos de los comentarios.
Leer: ¬øCu√°ntas horas puede viajar un gato?
Asimismo, otras personas criticaron la acci√≥n de la tripulaci√≥n, pues separaron a Ovie de su due√±o original. Ante esto, Bayley respondi√≥: ‚ÄúNo tenemos ning√∫n deseo de tomar el gato de nadie, sin embargo, las acciones del due√±o y la falta de preparaci√≥n de los documentos necesarios para la entrada en Nueva Zelanda, donde estaban desembarcando sin planes de volver a los EE. UU., dej√≥ cero opciones, excepto encontrar un nuevo hogar o que le apliquen la eutanasia al gato‚Äù.
Por el momento, Royal Caribbean est√° investigando c√≥mo el pasajero logr√≥ ingresar al gato y evadir todos los sistemas de seguridad, pues, seg√∫n la pol√≠tica de la compa√±√≠a, solo se permiten a bordo perros de apoyo emocional o perros de servicio.
üêæ ¬øQuiere estar al d√≠a y conocer las √∫ltimas noticias sobre el mundo animal? Lo invitamos a verlas en La Red Zoocial. üê∂üê± Adem√°s, si tiene alguna historia o est√° interesado en contar la suya con su mascota, puede escribirnos a [email protected]
